description: Covered entity's self-assessment of HIPAA compliance status
scope: All areas of HIPAA compliance including Privacy Security and Breach Notification

description: Focused examination of specific areas of concern or risk
frequency: As needed based on risk assessment
scope: Specific systems, processes, or workforce areas identified as high-risk

description: Investigation and review following security incident or suspected breach
scope: All aspects of breach incident including scope cause impact and response

description: Assessment of business associate compliance with HIPAA and Business Associate Agreement
scope: All business associates and their use and disclosure of PHI

description: Review of user access to systems and PHI
scope: Access lists permissions authentication logs activity monitoring

description: Verification of encryption implementation and key management
scope: Encryption standards, key storage, access controls, cryptographic measures

description: Assessment of workforce training program effectiveness and compliance
scope: Training curriculum, attendance records, competency assessment, refresher timing

description: Examination of physical safeguards protecting systems and facilities
scope: Facility access, surveillance, workstation security, media storage

description: Review of HIPAA required documentation completeness and accuracy
scope: Policies procedures, risk assessments, training records, incident logs

description: Independent external assessment of HIPAA compliance
frequency: Annually or as requested by regulators
scope: Comprehensive review of all compliance domains by external auditor
